Question: This person is drawn with only a small curl of hair at the front of his head, and a little in the back.
Hints: Like the other characters in the strip, this person's head is approximately the size of his body.
And in the TV special, Someday You'll Find Her, this person, Linus tells this person that he gets a new true love every week.
This person also constantly falls for Lucy's "football gag".
